name: JobsNOW! Program - Workforce Development
description: JobsNOW! is SFHSA’s free employment program that matches job seekers with employers and subsidizes salaries for up to six months.
fullDescription: JobsNOW! is SFHSA’s free employment program that matches job seekers with employers and subsidizes salaries for up to six months.
whatTheyOffer: JobsNOW! is SFHSA’s free employment program that matches job seekers with employers and subsidizes salaries for up to six months.
howToGetIt: Call 877-562-1669 or email applyforjobsnow@sfgov.org Eligibility: - Live in San Francisco - Are authorized to work in the U.S. - Are at least 18 years of age or older - Meet certain income requirements or receive public benefits through SFHSA - Whether you are eligible depends on your income and household size. You are eligible if you make less than $38,640 per year for single adults or $79,500 for a family of four. Or, you are eligible if you already receive other SFHSA benefits, including CalWORKs, CalFresh, or are a current/former foster youth.
